title: How to Make a Beaded Coil Bracelet

steps.headline: Clip one end, up from the coil.
steps.description: Where you  clip the wire will determine how many coils will be in the finished bracelet.

steps.headline: Using pliers, curl up one end of the wire at the very tip.
steps.description: This will keep the beads from sliding off the wire.

steps.headline: Add beads one at a time, starting at the opposite end.
steps.description: Carefully push the beads around the coils to the end.

steps.headline: Leave a small length at the end and curl up the wire using pliers

text: Clip one end, up from the coil. Where you  clip the wire will determine how many coils will be in the finished bracelet. Using pliers, curl up one end of the wire at the very tip. This will keep the beads from sliding off the wire. Add beads one at a time, starting at the opposite end. Carefully push the beads around the coils to the end. Leave a small length at the end and curl up the wire using pliers  Finished.
